items.title: SEEK. Melbourne, Australia.
items.subtitle: Senior Developer
items.content: Development of SEEK apply page on ReactJS. Building new experimental features with best development practices and maintanibility-first mindset. Updating and mantaining C# legacy system.

items.title: OCC Mundial. Queretaro, Mexico
items.subtitle: Senior Developer
items.content: Development of OCC Mundial main site on ReactJS. Changed URLs on site to get better SEO ranking creating an uplift of organic traffic of 30%. Helped in developing and mantaining CI/CD pipeline to decrease release time. Defined code standards for front-end developers. Training and coaching of junior developers.

items.title: SEEK. Melbourne, Australia.
items.subtitle: Senior Developer
items.content: Development of JobsDB Hong Kong job search site on ReactJS. Tech lead for job detail page. Site built on escalable architecture on AWS EC2 & Lamba for multiple countries & brands on southeast Asia.

items.title: Thermofisher Scientific. Tijuana, Mexico.
items.subtitle: Senior Developer
items.content: Development of Nanodrop web app for Thermofisher cloud. It allowed scientists to upload files and visualize data in graphs. Site build server-less on AWS Java Lambdas, DynamoDB, Angular for front-end and Jenkins for deployment.

items.title: Oracle. Guadalajara, Mexico.
items.subtitle: Business Intelligence Analyst
items.content: Improved OBIEE reports. Optimized processing time up to 90% through PL/SQL code refactoring.

items.title: Research Program
items.content: University of Notre Dame. Indiana. USA.
items.subContent: Development of Eclipse plugin to visualize code as node graphs.

items.title: Open Source Colaborator
items.content:
Helped translating React and Jest docs to Spanish.
Contibuted to Coral Project Talk.

items.title: Facebook Developer Circles Speaker
items.content: Presented about unit testing on ReactJS at a meetup.

items.title: 3 times national finalist of Microsoft Imagine Cup Mexico
items.content: Development of web & mobile apps for Microsoft platforms. Our projects aimed at solving different social issues, such as medical emergencies, increase blood donation & effective use of energy at interiors. Tools used include Windows Phone SDK, .NET MVC & Azure.

items.title: IT Students Association President
items.content: Organized different talks for fellow students with speakers from Google, IBM, Apple & Microsoft.
